ovdesc.p: Holds the Main AZ.ACCOUNT contract id for which the sub accounts in AZ.SUB.ACC is available. Key to this application.
Contains the available sub accounts that can be used for the Key Main account.

desc.p: Holds the Main AZ.ACCOUNT contract id for which the sub accounts in AZ.SUB.ACC is available. Key to this application.
Contains the available sub accounts that can be used for the Key Main account.
